items.text: loud appeal but not given. Went down on one knee to sweep, and was struck on the pads. Perhaps it was missing off? West Indies don't have a review left
items.shortText: Bishoo to Mushfiqur Rahim, no run

items.text: stays back to turn this to deep square leg
given some air outside off, he pushes it to backward point.
items.shortText: Bishoo to Tamim Iqbal, no run

items.text: length ball outside off, defended back
items.shortText: Powell to Mushfiqur Rahim, no run

items.text: length on off, moves across and drills it down to long-on
leg side length ball, tucked off the pads to deep fine leg
items.shortText: Powell to Tamim Iqbal, FOUR runs

items.text: full, angled across off, leans into a drive to extra cover
short and wide, slapped past point diving to his right
now he angles one into the pads and Mushfiq turns it away behind square for his fifty
pitched up outside off, driven to point
takes a good stride across and turns it away into the on side
items.shortText: Bishoo to Tamim Iqbal, no run

items.text: length, spins in, shuffles across and defends
items.shortText: Bishoo to Tamim Iqbal, no run

items.text: short of length, spins in, backs away and cuts through point
full, spinning in from outside off, drilled to long-on
gets forward and pushes into the covers
items.shortText: Bishoo to Mushfiqur Rahim, no run

items.text: back of a length, tucked off the pads to deep midwicket
pushes a fuller one down to long-on
length, tucked off the pads to square leg
slower cutter, gets down to paddle it and makes no contact. West Indies appeal for a caught-behind but appeal withheld
items.shortText: Powell to Mushfiqur Rahim, no run
Powell to Mushfiqur Rahim, FOUR runs

items.text: length, angled in, punched to long-on
fetches a sweep from outside off and gets a top-edge towards deep square
spins in from a length, nudged to the bowler's left
items.shortText: Bishoo to Tamim Iqbal, no run

items.text: gets down for a big slog and has to fetch it from well outside off, drags it down the throat of deep midwicket where Roach takes it in front of him

dismissal.text: Tamim Iqbal c Roach b Bishoo 50 (63b 4x4 1x6) SR: 79.36

items.text: flicked to midwicket
items.shortText: Bishoo to Shakib Al Hasan, 1 run
